lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox closer Craig Kimbrel was supposed to get a "soft" outing in his return from left knee surgery, according to manager John Farrell. It didn't work out that way.

headline.print_headline: Betts Homers in 9th, Kimbrel Saves in Return for Red Sox
headline.main: Betts Homers in 9th, Kimbrel Saves in Return for Red Sox

snippet: Boston Red Sox closer Craig Kimbrel was supposed to get a "soft" outing in his return from left knee surgery, according to manager John Farrell. It didn't work out that way....
